Time-Sensitive Logic.Round Duration: Each round lasts for blocksPerRound blocks, approximately one day.
Time-Sensitive Logic.Winner Decision Time: The winner is determined based on the block hash after the round ends.

Conditional Logic Paths.Subpot Cashing: Dependent on whether the round has ended, the subpot index is valid, and the subpot is not already cashed.
Conditional Logic Paths.Ticket Purchase: If funds sent are not enough for a full ticket, a partial refund is issued.
